section.title: Installation Steps

listitem.para: Install the cartridges_dav.vad package by using the Conductor UI or by using iSQL:
listitem.programlisting:
SQL> DB.DBA.VAD_INSTALL('tmp/cartridges_dav.vad',0); SQL_STATE SQL_MESSAGE VARCHAR VARCHAR _______________________________________________________________________________
00000 No errors detected 00000 Installation of "Linked Data Cartridges" is complete. 00000 Now making a final checkpoint. 00000 Final checkpoint is made. 00000 SUCCESS
6 Rows. -- 1078 msec.

section.para: See Also: Cartridges Package content description.
